product_overview: A comprehensive system to manage all aspects of student life and administrative operations within educational institutions, including admissions, attendance, library services, hostel management, exams, fees, and real-time dashboards.
core_goals: Streamline student admission and enrollment processes.
Enable efficient attendance tracking and reporting.
Manage library book issues and returns smoothly.
Facilitate hostel room allocation and fee management.
Simplify exam scheduling, result entry, and publishing.
Handle fee payments and generate receipts and reports.
Provide role-based access control for users including students, faculty, admin, and guardians.
Deliver real-time insights and updates through a dashboard powered by SignalR.
key_features: Student registration, document upload, and admission status tracking.
Attendance marking and comprehensive attendance records with reporting capabilities.
Library management including book issuance, returns, and catalog browsing.
Hostel allocation, room management, and hostel fee processing.
Exam scheduling, result entry, and result publication functionalities.
Fee payment processing, receipt generation, and fee reporting.
Role and user management to enforce security and access control.
Real-time dashboard updates using SignalR technology.
user_flow_summary: Students can register for admission by submitting required documents, then track admission status.
Faculty and admin staff mark attendance, view records, and generate attendance reports.
Students and staff can issue and return library books, browse library catalog.
Admin allocates hostel rooms to students and manages associated fees.
Faculty and admin schedule exams, enter results, and publish them for students to view.
Students and guardians make fee payments and access payment receipts and reports.
Admins assign roles and manage user permissions to ensure secure access.
Users receive real-time updates on system status and notifications via the SignalR dashboard.
validation_criteria: Successful student registrations with document uploads and admission tracking.
Accurate attendance marking and correct generation of attendance reports.
Library transactions processed correctly with up-to-date catalog.
Hostel room allocations are correctly assigned with accurate fee management.
Exam schedules created and results published without errors.
Fees payments processed and receipts generated successfully.
Role-based access controls prevent unauthorized access.
Real-time dashboard updates are timely and accurate using SignalR.
